variants.name: coal
variants.description: This lump of coal has absorbed mystical energies from the earth over millennia, burning with an unusual, smoky flame that never seems to extinguish.

variants.name: iron
variants.description: This iron ore is imbued with ancient smithing spells, making it incredibly resilient and valuable for crafting powerful weapons and armor.

variants.name: steel
variants.description: Steel ore that has been tempered by the breath of a dragon, granting it exceptional strength and the ability to withstand magical enchantments.

variants.name: tin
variants.description: Tin ore known for its protective qualities, often used in the creation of magical barriers and wards to guard against dark sorcery.

variants.name: copper
variants.description: This highly conductive copper ore attracts magical currents, making it essential for crafting artifacts that harness electrical energies.

variants.name: bronze
variants.description: Bronze ore blessed by the ancient gods, often used to forge medals and statues commemorating heroes and their legendary deeds.

variants.name: silver
variants.description: Silver ore bathed in the light of a full moon, imbuing it with the power to ward off evil spirits and curses.

variants.name: gold
variants.description: Gold ore that radiates a regal aura, sought after by kings and queens throughout the ages for its beauty and magical affinity.
